forum.content:
老歌的經典

I swear.... by the moon and the stars in the skies.

讓我想起一個男孩....


And I swear... like the shadow that’s by your side,

有著深刻的期望。


I see the questions in your eyes...

I know what’s weighing on your mind.

讓我記起那段悸動的....初章。


You can be sure Iknow my part.

第一次與妳仰望星空的畫面，


Cause I ...

Stand beside you through the years,

You’ll only cry those happy tears.

隨著妳的影子....牽起彼此的疑慮。



And though I’ll make mistakes,

我明白妳的擔憂令妳低頭不語，


I’ll never break your heart.

但妳可以放心.....


And...


妳已經在我心中。

(I swear....by the moon and the stars in the skies.)




雖然相首時間不長.....但我從未覺得太晚，

妳的微笑是我相信的理由。


I’ll be there I swear...

Like the shadow that’s by your side,

I’ll be there for better or worse..

Till death do us part.

I’ll love you with every beat of my heart...


And I swear .. oh....


I'll give you everything Ican,

I’llbuild your dreams with these two hands ,

We’ll hang some memories on the walls,

And when.. just the two of us are there.




等不到季節的春替，冬至無法將我們分離...

You won’t have to ask if I still care,
Cause as the time turns the page...


秋天我們一起在日記上寫思念，


My love won’t age at all.....


夏日的夜晚我們又在星空下相聚....。


(I swear....by the moon and the stars in the skies.)


告訴我....這是一個奇蹟。


I’ll be there for better or worse

Till death do us part.

I’ll love you with every beat of my heart

And I swear...


耳邊響起.....老歌的經典，I swear....在我們之間徘迴。


I swear....by the moon and the stars in the skies,

I’ll bethere... I’ll bethere...

I swear....


詞中的畫面一一浮現....


Like the shadow that’s by your side,

I’ll be there for better or worse..

Till death do us part.

I’ll love you with every single...



我感動的無法言語，


Beat of my heart


從妳的眼中，我看見.........And I swear....。



By Danny.
forum.title: 老歌的經典..(這不是翻譯，只是聽歌時的感受。)
